To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-03-18 15:22
Subject: Scheduled Maintenance for AIA and WM9 - 22/03/2025
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

Dear Colleagues, 

 

To ensure business continuity and enhance system performance, we have scheduled essential maintenance on the database infrastructure for WMS and AIA.

 

Maintenance Schedule:
Start: Saturday, March 22, 2025 | 10:00 PM GST

End: Saturday, March 22, 2025 | 11:59 PM GST

 

During this period, access to Warehouse Application (WMS) and Oracle AIA will be temporarily unavailable.

 

If you require any assistance during this time, we kindly request you to raise a support ticket by visiting OneReach.

 

Click here for more updates: Chalhoub Technology & Data Service Status <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Chalhoub Technology & Data Status Page <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/>
